name: Finders Keepers (itch) (Rajcsányi László)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Finders Keepers is a video game written by David Jones and the first game in the Magic Knight series. It was published on the Mastertronic label for the ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, MSX, Commodore 64, and Commodore 16 in 1985. 

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Original Story:

Magic Knight has been sent to the Castle of Spriteland by the King of Ibsisima in order to find a special present for Princess Germintrude. If Magic Knight is successful in his quest, he may have proved himself worthy of joining the famous "Polygon Table", a reference to the mythical Round Table from the legends of King Arthur.

The Gameboy version is based on Adrian Sheppard's Commodore 16 conversion with some sprites and idea of the original ZX Spectrum game.

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys
Jump: B
Accept: A
Save/Load game: Select

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys
Jump: Ctrl, X
Accept: Z
Save/Load game: Shift

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link:
http://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Finders_Keepers
